item.title: Thinking, drinking and nude models – the finest of fine art
item.author: Christopher Clarke,
item.description: Now I know that for most people a night out consists of drinking and dancing followed by some form of fast food and a hangover that could slay a rhino. I must confess that I am all in favor of that plan in that precise order; however it’s taken another night out with the Leonardo Fine Art Society to …

item.title: Cold Hard Cash
item.author: Christopher Clarke,
item.description: As a classical art enthusiast, I would be the first to admit that I can be somewhat pessimistic when it comes to contemporary art. Long have I held the somewhat closed-minded view that a number of today’s more renowned modern artists are in fact talentless criminals with a license to print/paint …
